subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A five-time All-Star who was acquired Tuesday in a trade with the Colorado Rockies, Tulowitzki went 3 for 5 with two doubles and three R.B.I. in Toronto’s 8-2 win.
snippet: A five-time All-Star who was acquired Tuesday in a trade with the Colorado Rockies, Tulowitzki went 3 for 5 with two doubles and three R.B.I. in Toronto’s 8-2 win.
